root.name: SoniComi
root.description: OverviewSoniComi is a visual novel and photography game developed by Nitroplus staring their mascot Super Soniko. It puts the player in the role of Soniko's photographer, following her both on and off work as she tries to tries to make a career as an idol.The game was released for Windows on September 30th, 2011 in Japan. An enhanced port titled Motto! SoniComi is due out in March 2014 for the PlayStation 3, featuring improved graphics and additional clothes for Soniko to wear.
